DOC.brief_summary: - Primary Objective: to evaluate the interaction with food after a single oral dose of a fixed combination of amodiaquine (AQ) and artesunate (AS) (COARSUCAM™) in healthy male subjects - Secondary Objective: to assess the clinical and biological safety and tolerability of Coarsucam™
DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability of the Fixed Combination of Amodiaquine and Artesunate Under Fed & Fasted Conditions
DOC.criteria: Healthy Caucasian subjects Weight between 50 kg and 90 kg. 18 ≤ Body Mass Index ≤ 28 kg/m2. The above information is not intended to contain all considerations relevant to a patient's potential participation in a clinical trial.
